891 
 
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS   
POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS   UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
    l) OSUNPOLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
two (2) Basic Sciences subjects, Geography, 
Economics/ Commerce. It accepts credit in 
Animal Husbandry/Food and Nutrition.  
m) IMO-POLY accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
from English Language, Mathematics, 
Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science/Health 
Science and any one (1) from the following: 
Biology/Health Science/Agricultural Science,  
Physics, Economics/Commerce, Addi tional/ 
Further Mathematics, Home Economics, Food 
and Nutrition, Geography. ‘O’ level pass in 
Physics is accepted.  
n) MAPOLY requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
at not more than two (2) sittings to include 
Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural 
Science. ‘O’ level passes in Physics and English 
Language is accepted.  
o) OZORO accepts a pass in Physics.  
p) FIDEIPOLY accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes to include Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Biology/Agricultural Science/ Health Science, 
Economics/Commerce, Additional/Further 
Mathematics, Statistics, Home Economics, Food 
and Nutrition/Hotel Catering and Geography. ‘O’ 
level passes in English and Physics is accepted.  
s) YABATECH requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language,  
Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural 
Science and any one (1) of the following Physics,  
Additional Mathematics, Economics, Food and  
Nutrition.   
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
i. IMT-ENU requires Biology.  
ii. YABATECH  requires  Mathematics,    
Biology/Agricultural Science and any one (1) of 
Physics, Chemistry, Economics.  
FORESTRY TECHNOLOGY  
  
ATAPOLY       
Five  (5)  SSC  credit 
 passes  in Mathematics, 
Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) 
Mathematics and any 
two (2) of Chemistry, 
Physics or Technical 
Drawing.  
(a) FECOFOR-JOS  
 i.  Requires one (1) of Biology/Agricultural  
Science, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics,
